item.title: First Post
item.description: Hi and welcome to my newly designed site. I had previously a (in hindsight) very ugly webpage, that i built last year in vanilla HTML, JS and CSS ðŸ¤®. Well it wasn’t that bad however i’ve learnt tons of new stuff in the last year and i wanted to try out with a static page generator. For this website i’ve chosen Hugo, and while i havent explored the possibilties completely it seems nice for small webpages.
